title: Minimal Air Pollution Exposure
description: In 2015, only a negligible percentage of the Maldivian population was exposed to PM2.5 air pollution levels exceeding WHO guidelines, highlighting the country's clean air quality.

title: Strong Human Resource Development
description: As of 2023, Maldives achieved a CPIA building human resources rating of 5, indicating a robust framework for developing human capital.

title: Low Teenage Pregnancy Rate
description: In 2017, only 1.6% of women aged 15-19 in the Maldives had children or were pregnant, reflecting effective reproductive health education and services.

title: Negative Aid Flow from Belgium
description: In 2017, the Maldives experienced a negative net bilateral aid flow from Belgium, amounting to -$200,000, indicating a financial outflow rather than support.
